item.title: Level Reqiuments
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

case 2101: if(playerLevel[14] >=5) if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0){ if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275){ sendMessage("You mine some rune essence"); addItem(1436, 1); addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[14]), 14); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(625); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You need to be weilding a pickaxe!"); } if(playerLevel[14] <=4) sendMessage("You need a mining level of 5 to mine this"); } break; }

I Think That is how you would do it…if not im sorry, i tried

Read full topic

item.title: Level Reqiuments
item.dc:creator: @Pie_Lord Pie Lord
item.description:
@Pie_Lord wrote:

ok i have this code…

case 2101:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275){
sendMessage("You mine some rune essence");
addItem(1436, 1);
addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[14]), 14);
actionTimer = 30;
setAnimation(625);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage("You need to be weilding a pickaxe!");
}
}
break;
}

i want to make so you 5 mining to mine it what do i have to add or can someone remake the code for me please?
thanks.

Read full topic
